Description: CloudFormation template for launching an EC2 instance with an open SSH port

Fn::Sub:
#!/bin/bash
yum update -y
yum install python3-pip -y
mkdir python
pip3 install requests -t ./python
zip -r requests_layer.zip ./python
aws s3 cp requests_layer.zip s3://opensky-s3-bucket-temp-files-${AWS::AccountId}/
yum install git -y
git clone https://github.com/bhite1/aws_opensky.git
aws s3 cp aws_opensky/lambda/lambda_to_dynamodb.py s3://opensky-s3-bucket-temp-files-${AWS::AccountId}
